alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 14 at 2:52PM CST until February 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS NOW IN EFFECT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI LATE TUESDAY MORNING INTO LATE TUESDAY AFTERNOON... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY FOR SOUTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW HUMIDITY, SUSTAINED WINDS TO 15MPH, AND ONGOING ABNORMALLY DRY CONDITIONS... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 067, 075, 076, 078, and 079. * WIND...Southeasterly winds of 10 to 15mph gusting to near 20mph. * HUMIDITY...Relative humidity values as low as 20% to 25%. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
